thsst.ontopop.api

Class Ontology

  • java.lang.Object
    • thsst.ontopop.api.Ontology

  • public class Ontology
extends java.lang.Object
    The Ontology class represents an Ontology in Java. It stores all information read from the Medical Ontology file and contains methods to access them.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static java.lang.String NS
      A local constant that contains the namespace of the ontology.
      protected static java.lang.String SOURCE
      A local constant that contains the source of the ontology.

      • loadOntology

        public static void loadOntology(java.lang.String pathToOWLOntology)
        Opens an OWL ontology.
        Parameters:
        pathToOWLOntology - the path to the ontology file to be loaded

      • getCondition

        public Condition getCondition(java.lang.String conditionName)
        Retrieves a condition from the ontology by name.
        Parameters:
        conditionName - the name of the condition to retrieve
        Returns:
        This returns a Condition object that matches the condition name passed as an argument. Returns null if no match is found.

      • getAllConditions

        public java.util.List<Condition> getAllConditions()
        Returns a list of all medical conditions currently stored in the ontology.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList of Condition objects

      • getFood

        public Food getFood(java.lang.String foodName)
        Retrieves a food item from the ontology by name.
        Parameters:
        foodName - the name of the food item to retrieve
        Returns:
        This returns a Food object that matches the food name passed as an argument.

      • getAllFood

        public java.util.List<Food> getAllFood()
        Returns a list of all food items currently stored in the ontology.
        Returns:
        A list of Food objects.

      • getAllFood

        public java.util.List<Food> getAllFood(java.lang.String nutrientName)
        Returns a list of all food items that contain a certain nutrient.
        Parameters:
        nutrientName - the name of the nutrient to check food items for
        Returns:
        A list of Food objects.

      • getAllFood

        public java.util.List<Food> getAllFood(java.lang.String nutrientName,
                                       double minAmount)
        Returns a list of all food items that contain a minimum amount of a certain nutrient.
        Parameters:
        nutrientName - the name of the nutrient to check food items for
        minAmount - the minimum amount required for nutrient nutrientName
        Returns:
        A list of Food objects.

      • getAllFoodFromGroup

        public java.util.List<Food> getAllFoodFromGroup(java.lang.String categoryName)
        Returns a list of all food items from a certain food group
        Parameters:
        categoryName - the name of the category to retrieve food items from
        Returns:
        A list of Food objects.
